me & my bad self

The work, projects & media of Jeffery Bennett

Episogood

Prev: Today's Bestest

Description

The social layer of podcast is broken because the podcatcher market is incredibly fragmented.

Episogood provides a compatibility layer for podcatchers, allowing friends to share episodes with friends agnostic of podcatcher choice.

Join today at Episogood

Next: Inauguration Countdown

Special Thanks

Episogood has been a labor of love with help from:

  • David Pett
  • Tim Drabandt

And additional thanks for help in navigating the podcast data world go to Nathan Gathright.
